name: Constellation Exploration
description:
Have you ever pointed up at the night sky and wondered which constellation you're looking at? Constellation Exploration is a VR constellation Learning Experience that allows players to live out this fantasy. Simply pointing at constellations and pressing a button will give you an unforgettable experience surrounding the mythos of the stars. All the stars were placed using data gathered from the Gaia database as well to ensure that it is as close to real as possible. This is a short demo showcase of what our experience is.
